instruction: Outline a new piece of technology.
output: A Smart Telescope is a telescope that has been developed to incorporate new features and technologies such as advanced optics, automated object tracking, enhanced zoom functionality, night vision capabilities, and integrated Wi-Fi for remote viewing. The telescope is also capable of capturing images of celestial bodies and storing them in high resolution. It is powered by a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery and can be controlled via an app on a phone or tablet.
